This item is covered with a one year warranty from Sam Ash. The Dean ML body style has been long associated with the late Dimebag Darrell of Pantera. This latest ML features a basswood body with Custom Pantera Vulgar Display of Power graphic. A bolt-on maple neck carries a 22-fret rosewood fingerboard. The 24-3/4" scale fingerboard enables players to shred solos and blaze through quick chord changes. This guitar also features black hardware, a Floyd Rose Special bridge, DBD Traction knobs, and Grover tuners to facilitate accurate, easy tuning. Case not included.
